original_title: Band of Bearded Brothers: The 2013 World Champion Red Sox
overview: Band of Bearded Brothers is narrated by former Red Sox first baseman and 2004 World Series champion Kevin Millar. With exclusive, behind other scenes footage and never-before-seen highlights, the film showcases how the 2013 Boston Red Sox overcame adversities and developed into a personality-driven, resilient team. This 81-minute film - produced by Major League Baseball Productions in association with NESN, the official network of the Boston Red Sox - provides untold stories that formed this team's unique identity and helped restore the faith of Red Sox Nation.
title: Band of Bearded Brothers: The 2013 World Champion Red Sox
